We are starting to carry hand held pollution monitors to monitor our local air pollution. Reducing global air pollution can prevent millions of premature deaths according to an international team of scientists, led by the Max Planck Institute for Chemistry.

Air pollution in the UK is a major cause of diseases such as asthma, lung disease, stroke, and heart disease, and is estimated to cause forty thousand premature deaths each year, which is about 8.3% of deaths, while costing around £40 billion each year https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Air_pollution_in_the_United_Kingdom …
